No Pitches. Only Passion.

Find Out More

What is Wichitalks?

Have you ever wanted to get the pulse of a city? To slice through it and look at a cross section?

You know, to see the composition.

Wichita is defined by the passions and actions of the individuals who make it up.

Absolutely no pitches are allowed. Presenters are individuals in Wichita who have a passion to share. They may be business owners, volunteers, or life-hackers. The goal is to teach something of social value and to spread ideas.

So, if you'd like to learn more about your city, Wichitalks is a great place to start.

How does it work?

The Guidelines

20 Slides

Each speaker must have 20 slides.

15 Second Auto-Advance

Each slide auto-advances after 15 seconds to keep the talk moving.

No Pitches Allowed

Speakers are only presenting their passion. Teaching and sharing ideas.

#ilovewichita

Presenters are the everyday, passionate individuals that are defining Wichita.

So, when is it?

Wichitalks at WSU

by Shocker Startup

September 16

Doors at 6. Talks at 7.


Join us at Beggs Hall for an evening of passion and connection!

Attendance is free, but space is limited!

All proceeds help cover the venue costs, video editing, photography, marketing, and help fund other Startup Wichita community events.

Speaking Applications are Open!

for

Wichitalks at WSU

hosted by

Shocker Startup

Please apply if you are passionate about something, anything at all.
Even if your slides have absolutely no correlation to your presentation,
if you have one slide repeating 20 times, or you want to act or perform something creative.
You don't even have to say anything, as long as there is some sort of message.

The guidelines are wide open to creative interpretation.

If you have any question or are unclear about if what you want to do will be accepted, apply anyway.
We'll give you feedback on whether it fits or if you need to fine tune your application.

Apply to Present!

Volunteer!

Would you enjoy greeting everyone as they come in, be their first interaction with Wichitalks?
Would you enjoy helping us setup the venue?
Do you have no idea what you can do, but just have this burning desire to volunteer?

Please Join Our Team!

Wichitalks is a community driven event, so it's success relies on the awesome volunteers in Wichita.
Just reach out to us via social media or email.
